name: Epic Bean Among Us Simulator 3D 2022 Development Build
name_original: Epic Bean Among Us Simulator 3D 2022 Development Build
description:
Created uses Unity's Visual Scripting tool, BOLT.

This is the Development Build for Epic Bean Among Us Simulator 3D 2022. Please know that there may be bugs or errors in this build.

  • Credits button in Main Menu doesn't work. (Not implemented in current build)
  • Jetpack/backpack particles showing all the time.
  • Small map.

CONTROLS:

W - Fly Up

S - Fly Down

D - Move Right/Forward

A - Move Left/Backward

Esc - Exit to Main Menu

Stable Build: Epic Bean Among Us Simulator 3D 2022
